Others: The article discusses Lonzo Ball's return to the Chicago Bulls after a two-season absence.
Ball played 15 minutes in the preseason finale against the Cleveland Cavaliers, scoring 11 points, 3 assists, and 3 rebounds.
Ball mentioned that he's been pain-free for the second straight game.
The article mentions that Ball's play has been better than expected, but he himself does not believe his play has surpassed his expectations.
The Chicago Bulls will open their season against the New Orleans Pelicans on October 23.
